name: Dungeon S.A.D.C
description:
Your trapped inside a Dungeon where you constantly need Food and weapons to protect yourself With,

every donation gets me closer to bying gamemaker pro, then i can reupload the game as a browser game

Tutorial: press the stat "Food" to eat

like in the white text on the left ^^

pickup items by pressing them Space to pause

Can we hit a new record for people downloading this game in 1 day? (!) Current: 9 downloads in 1 day (!)

All you have to do is to share this link with your friends! And the new record will be set just because of you!!!


the newest version is always at the buttom
